original_text: Then Balaam started to speak his message from God. He said, ‘Balak, the king of Moab, has brought me from Syria. He brought me from the mountains in the east. He said “Come and curse Jacob's descendants for me. Say bad things against the Israelites!”
korean_text: 발람이 예언을 전하여 말하되 발락이 나를 아람에서, 모압 왕이 동쪽 산에서 데려다가 이르기를 와서 나를 위하여 야곱을 저주하라, 와서 이스라엘을 꾸짖으라 하도다

sentences.original_text: Then Balaam started to speak his message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 발라암이 하나님의 말씀을 전하기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: Balak, the king of Moab, has brought me from Syria
sentences.korean_translation: 모압 왕 발락이 나를 시리아에서 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He brought me from the mountains in the east
Come and curse Jacob's descendants for me
sentences.korean_translation: 와서 나를 위해 야곱의 자손들을 저주하세요

sentences.original_text: Say bad things against the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성들을 향해 나쁜 말들을 하세요
